dcterms:description: The ACDC dataset is a 2D benchmark medical dataset focusing on cardiac image analysis, targeting the assessment of cardiac function. It contains 100 Magnetic Resonance Imaging (MRI) scans from 100 patients, which can be divided into a training set containing 70 MRI scans, a validation set containing 10 MRI scans, and a testing set containing 20 MRI scans.
dcterms:title: ACDC (Automated Cardiac Diagnosis Challenge)

dcterms:creator: Ailiang Lin
Bingzhi Chen
Jiayu Xu
Zheng Zhang
Guangming Lu
David Zhang
dcterms:description: The LA dataset is a 3D benchmark medical dataset constructed from the Atrial Segmentation Challenge dataset, which consists of a collection of 100 fully annotated 3D gadolinium-enhanced MRI scans. It is divided into a training set containing 80 MRI scans and a validation set containing 20 MRI scans.
dcterms:title: LA (Left Atrium)

dcterms:creator: Xiangde Luo
Minhao Hu
Tao Song
Guotai Wang
Shaoting Zhang
dcterms:description: The Pancreas dataset is used for semi-supervised medical image segmentation and consists of 3D MRI scans. It is utilized to evaluate the performance of segmentation methods in the context of limited labeled data.
dcterms:title: Pancreas
